meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>earth</kanji>'s <kanji>shell</kanji> is called the <vocabulary>earth's crust</vocabulary>. You should have learned that in earth science. And if you didn't, at least you know now!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
